name: Men's T-shirt
title: Comfortable cotton t-shirt
description: This comfortable cotton t-shirt is designed for casual wear. Available in multiple colors and sizes for every man.

name: Men's Jacket
title: Stylish leather jacket
description: A sleek leather jacket with a smooth finish. Perfect for layering during the cooler months, combining fashion and function.

name: Men's Sneakers
title: Comfortable sports sneakers
description: These stylish sneakers are designed for both comfort and performance. Ideal for sports and casual activities.

name: Men's Hoodie
title: Cozy hoodie for everyday wear
description: This hoodie provides both warmth and style. Perfect for casual outings and layering during colder days.

name: Men's Jeans
title: Slim-fit denim jeans
description: These slim-fit denim jeans offer a modern and trendy look. Durable and comfortable for everyday wear.

name: Men's Casual Shirt
title: Breathable cotton shirt
description: This lightweight cotton shirt is perfect for casual outings. It offers comfort and breathability for all-day wear.

name: Men's Blazer
title: Classic tailored blazer
description: A classic tailored blazer perfect for formal events or dressing up casual outfits. Adds a touch of sophistication to any look.

name: Men's Shorts
title: Comfortable summer shorts
description: These comfortable shorts are perfect for hot summer days. Pair them with a t-shirt or polo for a relaxed look.

name: Men's Polo Shirt
title: Classic polo shirt
description: This classic polo shirt combines comfort with a smart casual look. Ideal for both office wear and casual outings.

name: Men's Sweatpants
title: Comfortable fleece sweatpants
description: These fleece sweatpants offer ultimate comfort for lounging or working out. Soft and cozy, they’re perfect for staying relaxed.

name: Men's Vest
title: Cotton tank top vest
description: This cotton vest is perfect for hot days or layering under a shirt or jacket. Soft and breathable, it’s a wardrobe essential.

name: Men's Cardigan
title: Stylish wool cardigan
description: This wool cardigan offers both warmth and style, perfect for layering over a shirt or t-shirt during cooler months.
